name: TConnectSync for Heroku
description: Flask wrapper for tconnectsync running in Heroku, which synchronizes tconnect data to Nightscout

PUMP_SERIAL_NUMBER.description: Tandem t:slim X2 pump serial number. Visible in the tconnect web UI and in Pump Info on the pump.

NS_SECRET.description: Secret key for your Nightscout instance

TCONNECTSYNC_HEROKU_SECRET.description: A secret key used to trigger a tconnectsync run

TCONNECTSYNC_HEROKU_INTERVAL_MINS.description: How frequently to trigger tconnectsync on its own. Set to 0 or blank if tconnectsync should not be triggered in a background thread
